sampling_scheme: random momentary prompts and scheduled daily diary
additional_comments: S2 in the paper; no beep information available; some timestamp coding unclear; affect items could relate to feeling at the moment or during the past interaction; https://osf.io/7a5de provides a good overview of previous usage of data

features.name: interaction
features.coding:
unclear wording, but likely: Did you have any social interactions since your last prompt?
0 = no
1 = yes
features.details: unclear wording, but likely: Did you have any social interactions since your last prompt?

features.name: dom_sub_you
features.coding:
Please rate your behavior toward the other person during this interaction.
-50 = Accomodating/Submissive/Timid
50 = Assertive/Dominant/Controlling
features.details: Please rate your behavior toward the other person during this interaction.
features.construct: interpersonal dominance, social behavior, big five, extraversion

features.name: warm_cold_you
features.coding:
Please rate your behavior toward the other person during this interaction.
-50 = Cold/Distant/Hostile
50 = Warm/Friendly/Caring
features.details: Please rate your behavior toward the other person during this interaction.
features.construct: interpersonal affiliation, social behavior, big five, agreeableness

features.name: happy_interaction
features.coding:
How happy did you feel during the interaction?

100 = Extremely
features.details: How happy did you feel during the interaction?
features.construct: happiness, positive affect, affect, social interaction
